:: Rainchark ::

:: Rainchark dodges all but one of the optic blasts.  The optic blast 
makes contact squarly on Rainchark's shoulder, spinning him around 
relentlessly.  After stopping and regaining his balance, Rainchark 
fires 5 energy shots (optic blasts from a gun) at Aquataur, angry 
that his first battle scar had been obtained from a weak, feeble bot. 
::
